NAME: Known regressions in ScummVM since 0.4.1
DESC: This is a list of current regressions introduced since 0.4.1

ul.li:
Monkey Island 2:
Looking at the coffin to mojo makes guybrush float up then appear in the hut. See bug report 766532.
Full Throttle:
The sound in the intro sequence doesn't work as well as it used to. See bug report 765800.
